EmailTemplate.name: San Francisco - Fall 2011.Parking Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See You at the Fairmont!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We can’t wait to see you at our upcoming Networking Reception, taking place at the Fairmont San Francisco’s Tonga Room this Wednesday, December 7, from 5:30 – 8:30!
Also, just a few options for parking garages nearby, if you are unable to find street parking:
Masonic Auditorium 1111 California St. $8/hour, $30 max
Metro Parking Garage 1045 California St. $31 maximum
Grace Cathedral parking garage 1051 Taylor St. $27 maximum
Imperial parking SBC park stadium $35
Fairmont Hotel 950 Mason Street $52 Daily max. plus 14% city tax
Brocklebank Parking Garage 1040 Sacramento St. $38 compact vehicles $45 all other vehicles
Thanks and we look forward to seeing you!
MBO Partners
